name: Too Many Balls
description:
A and D (or arrow keys if you prefer) to move left or right

Mouse to aim your bat

Don't let the balls hit the bottom of the screen! Make balls hit each other to make a bigger ball which will give you double points. Juggling balls also gives you higher score.

I hope you will enjoy this game. Made it in a day to get some practice in before Ludum Dare. Please give feedback if possible, I would like to put more effort into this one day and make something really good
